"About [White Day Points]":
"About [White Day Points]

It seems that the Naura Cake Shop is open at the Floating Continent.
There are already a number of ARKS members heading towards it."

"However, there is trouble along the way...

If you can solve any sudden phenomenon during the exploration and help save those ARKS members who are blocked by traps, you will receive [White Day Points]."
"Please aim to collect [314] points of [White Day Points] and clear the quest within the time limit."
